TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MessageQueueAccessControlEntry extends System.Messaging.AccessControlEntry

summary.span: 指定信任項 (Trustee) (使用者、群組或電腦) 執行訊息佇列工作的存取權。

span.span: Specifies access rights for a trustee (user, group, or computer) to perform Message Queuing tasks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別，以指定要套用至信任者的權限。Use the class to specify rights to apply to a trustee. 這些權限包括查看、 接收或傳送的訊息;檢視或修改佇列屬性或權限;和刪除佇列。These rights include peeking, receiving, or sending messages; viewing or modifying queue properties or permissions; and deleting queues. 類別的方法會提供這個類別的執行個體直接傳入方法中，或將它新增至執行個體的多載，讓您可以一次新增多個信任者的權限。The class's method provides overloads for passing an instance of this class directly into the method, or adding it to an instance of so that you can add rights for more than one trustee at a time. 新的存取權限會附加至佇列的判別存取控制清單 (DACL)，用來識別的使用者和群組可以存取佇列的結尾。The new access right is appended to the end of the queue's discretionary access control list (DACL), which identifies the users and groups that can access the queue. 有一些例外狀況有關加入新的權限的位置和其效果。There are some exceptions to this generalization about where the new right is added and its effects. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 多載建構函式可讓您指定指出是否要允許或拒絕權限至信任項的成員。An overload of the constructor allows you specify a member to indicate whether to allow or deny rights to the trustee. 權限會允許或拒絕資源的 DACL 中的順序會影響是否信任項具有指定的權限。The order in which rights are allowed or denied in the resource's DACL affects whether the trustee has the specified rights. 比方說，如果權限已經授予信任項和您稍後新增的項目以拒絕它們，系統會先尋找被授予的權限，授與使用者權限，因此您可能想要使用者被拒絕。For example, if rights have already been granted to the trustee and you later add an entry that denies them, the system finds the granted rights first, so the user is granted rights you might have intended they be denied. 您可以使用覆寫這個行為的兩個項目類型：`Set`和`Revoke`。You can use two entry types to override this behavior: `Set` and `Revoke`. 如需有關如何控制在哪些存取權限會決定的方式的詳細資訊，請參閱列舉主題。For more information about controlling the way in which access rights are determined, see the enumeration topic. 類別具有存取控制清單 (Acl)，可用來讓使用者存取訊息佇列系統本身為基礎的安全性是相關聯。The class is associated with security based on access control lists (ACLs), which you can use to give users access to the Message Queuing system itself. 這點不同於程式碼存取安全性透過實作和相關類別。This is different from code access security, which is implemented through the and related classes. 訊息佇列的程式碼存取安全性會定義佇列特定作業或佇列存取應用程式可能需要這受限於安全性控制項，它不代表應用程式執行這些作業，或接收的存取，本身的權限。Message Queuing code access security defines queue-specific operations or queue access that an application might require which is subject to security control; it does not represent a right for the application to perform these operations or receive access in and of itself. 請參閱主題[ [ \] ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/23a20143-241d-4fe5-9d9f-3933fd594c03)如需有關程式碼存取安全性。See the topic [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/23a20143-241d-4fe5-9d9f-3933fd594c03) for more information about code access security. 若要設定之信任項的訊息佇列權限，建立的新執行個體類別，並將它傳遞至的多載建構函式。To set message queue permissions for a trustee, create a new instance of the class and pass it into an overload of the constructor. 指定的訊息佇列存取權限藉由傳遞的執行個體建構函式，或藉由設定上的現有屬性執行個體。Specify the message queue access rights either by passing an instance of into the constructor or by setting the property on an existing instance. 您可以傳遞執行個體直接方法，或者將項目新增到的執行個體或再呼叫。You can then pass the instance directly to the method, or alternately add the entry to an instance of before calling .

summary.span: 以指定的信任項和訊息佇列存取權，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified trustee and Message Queuing access rights.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Messaging.Trustee trustee, valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueAccessRights rights) cil managed

param.name: trustee
param.span: ，指定使用者、群組、電腦、網域或別名。

span.span: A that specifies a user, group, computer, domain, or alias.

param.name: rights
param.span: 值的位元組合，它定義要授與信任項的權限組合。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values which defines the combination of rights to grant to the trustee.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，將指定的訊息佇列存取權授與指定的信任項。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, granting the specified Message Queuing access rights to the specified trustee.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用指定的信任項的權限授與的建構函式的這個多載。Use this overload of the constructor to grant rights to the specified trustee. 您在中指定的權限`rights`參數是成員的位元組合位元旗標，其中包括接收訊息、 刪除佇列，並設定佇列屬性的權限。The rights you specify in the `rights` parameter are a bitwise combination of members of the bitflag, which includes such rights as receiving messages, deleting queues, and setting queue properties. 建構函式會使用您設定這個執行個體的傳入的權限屬性。The constructor uses the rights you pass in to set this instance's property. 將這個執行個體傳遞直接插入的多載方法，以授與權限給此信任者，或加入至這個執行個體再呼叫授與或拒絕多個信任者的權限一次。Pass this instance of directly into an overload of the method to grant rights only to this trustee, or add this instance to a before calling to grant or deny rights to multiple trustees at once.

MemberSignature.Value: public MessageQueueAccessControlEntry (System.Messaging.Trustee trustee, System.Messaging.MessageQueueAccessRights rights, System.Messaging.AccessControlEntryType entryType);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Messaging.Trustee trustee, valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueAccessRights rights, valuetype System.Messaging.AccessControlEntryType entryType) cil managed

param.name: trustee
param.span: ，指定使用者、群組、電腦、網域或別名。

span.span: A that specifies a user, group, computer, domain, or alias.

param.name: rights
param.span: 值的位元組合，它定義要授與信任項的權限組合。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values which defines the combination of rights to grant to the trustee.

param.name: entryType
param.span: 其中一個值，指定是否允許、拒絕、設定或撤銷指定的權限。

span.span: One of the values, which specifies whether to allow, deny, set or revoke the specified rights.

summary.span: 以指定的信任項和訊息佇列存取權，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, with the specified trustee and Message Queuing access rights.

summary.span: 存取類型 (例如 或 ) 是由您傳入的項目類型來定義。

span.span: The type of access (such as or ) is defined by the entry type you pass in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個多載的建構函式來授與或拒絕指定的信任項的權限。Use this overload of the constructor to grant or deny rights to the specified trustee. 您在中指定的權限`rights`參數是成員的位元組合位元旗標，其中包括接收訊息、 刪除佇列，並設定佇列屬性的權限。The rights you specify in the `rights` parameter are a bitwise combination of members of the bitflag, which includes such rights as receiving messages, deleting queues, and setting queue properties. 建構函式會使用您設定這個執行個體的傳入的權限屬性。The constructor uses the rights you pass in to set this instance's property. 如需授與或拒絕權限的詳細資訊，請參閱主題。For more information about granting or denying rights, see the topic. 針對兩個成員，`Allow`和`Deny`，可能會有預先存在，可能是矛盾讓權限出現在佇列的判別存取控制清單 (DACL) 中的順序會影響是否為最終會授與權限的存取權限，.For two members, `Allow` and `Deny`, there may be preexisting and possibly contradictory access rights, so the order in which the rights appear in the queue's discretionary access control list (DACL) affects whether the right is ultimately granted. 兩個其他的成員`Set`和`Revoke`，覆寫任何現有的權限。Two other members, `Set` and `Revoke`, overwrite any existing rights. 使用您的應用程式適用的成員。Use the member whose behavior is applicable to your application. 將這個執行個體傳遞直接插入的多載方法，以授與或拒絕權限僅此信任者，或加入至這個執行個體再呼叫授與或拒絕多個信任者的權限一次。Pass this instance of directly into an overload of the method to grant or deny rights only to this trustee, or add this instance to a before calling to grant or deny rights to multiple trustees at once.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Messaging::MessageQueueAccessRights MessageQueueAccessRights { System::Messaging::MessageQueueAccessRights get(); void set(System::Messaging::MessageQueueAccessRights value); };
member this.MessageQueueAccessRights : System.Messaging.MessageQueueAccessRights with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要套用至信任項的訊息佇列專用權限集合。

span.span: Gets or sets the set of Message Queuing-specific rights to apply to the trustee.
A bitwise combination of the members.

value.span: 預設是由傳入建構函式的 參數定義。

span.span: The default is defined by the parameter passed into the constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您指定訊息佇列接收、 查看，或寫入訊息，或設定佇列屬性等的特定物件的權限。The property enables you to specify Message Queuing object-specific rights such as receiving, peeking, or writing messages, or setting queue properties. 這個屬性的值由設定建構函式，但是您可以變更它在任何時間，才能使用此執行個體呼叫中。The value of this property is set by the constructor, but you can change it at any time before using this instance of in a call to .
